short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension for developers✨ to keep track of their life's Variables⚡

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension keeps track of things that we've to remember in day-to-day life.
It saves details as key: value pair,
So, we don't have to remember them.

Update [1.2.0]: Added keypress and auto-focus for convenience, especially for those who use the keyboard a lot.

- Press "Enter" when the "Variable" input field to filled and the cursor will move to the "value" input field after filling it press "Enter" again to add this entry to the list.

- On "Update" of a Variable entry the cursor focus will be moved to the "value" field and the text in it will be selected for deletion or modification.

- The cursor will be focused on the empty "variable" field by default.

You are welcome to suggest new features for myVariables since it is an open-source project.
GitHub repo: https://github.com/its-mavi-dev/myVariables
